## ValueObservable interface

Extension of an Observable that allows to access the current value. This is compatible to BehaviorSubject

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ValueObservable<T> extends Observable<T> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [value](./react-utils.valueobservable.value.md) | <code>T</code> | Accesses the current value of the observable |
